segments.text: I have an idea for Christmas this year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's not exchange any gifts at all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hear me out . We can pool the money and give it to a family who could really use it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you may have some trouble convincing the kids .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actual 1y , it was their idea first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now we know that they realize the real meaning of Christmas .
segments.speaker: S2
